messages.subject: Re: Females in Government
messages.msgSnippet: Hi there Here, in New Zealand, we have a female Primeminister...I think, the first female Primeminister Elect. It seems to be her aim to get as many mothers
messages.messageBody:
Hi there

Here, in New Zealand, we have a female Primeminister...I think, the first
female Primeminister Elect.

It seems to be her aim to get as many mothers working as possible. For
instance, if I were to put my 3 year old in to daycare, I could get 50
free hours per week.

Since I want to keep her close, I get nothing whatsoever. I cheekily
asked if they would pay for her swimming lessons (at $10 a week, not the
@$150 they would pay if she were in daycare), but alas...the money is only
available if you send the child away from her family.

Shell (in NZ)
DS7 & DD3
